items.title: Linux BASH Shell Terminal Command Basics

visible_instructors.name: JP
visible_instructors.job_title: We Create Great Online Courses to Help Improve Your Life

items.headline: Introduction to Linux BASH Shell Terminal Commands (Debian distributions)
objectives_summary: Intro to basic shell terminal commands for Linux operating systems(debian distributions)
With Windows OS you can get along fine without knowing any terminal commands, but this is the opposite for Linux OS.
Having a basic knowledge of Linux terminal commands will greatly help Linux newbies to get comfortable with this OS, and to manage it.
